title: Does everyone have an enemy? - Quora

response.answer_text: In today’s world, yes. There is a quiet war being waged by the inhumane against the humane. The inhumane want to establish a NWO in which they control every aspect of the humane people’s lives, that is after they have culled 90% of the population as they are claiming. So ever humane person, whether they realise it or not, are up against a bitter enemy. And every inhumane person sees the humane as “the enemy”. But, in the end it is the humane who will wake up, realise their potential and win against the inhumane.
Does everyone have an enemy? Of course not! All of us have people who dislike us—how could it be otherwise? But it must be rare indeed for somebody who has an actual enemy.
If you don't have enemies, you don't have character. Paul Newman If you have enemies, that means at some point you took a stand. We all have that one person/group that we have pissed off.
